sentences.en: Based on reasonable construction plan, shorten construction time 131 days.
sentences.cn: 通过合理优化施工方案, 缩短建井总工期131天.

sentences.en: Either extreme may damage valve internal parts and shorten valve life.
sentences.cn: 流量过大,可能会损坏阀门内部构件,缩短阀门使用寿命.

sentences.en: Injury problems could shorten his career.
sentences.cn: 受伤的问题有可能缩短他的职业生涯。

sentences.en: Just take a little off on the top and shorten it in the back.
sentences.cn: 只要上面修剪一下,把后面的剪短就行.

sentences.en: Logarithms were invented to shorten the work of extended numerical computation.
sentences.cn: 人们发明对数来缩短运算冗长的数值计算工作.

sentences.en: Minor accidents can shorten the life of a car.
sentences.cn: 小事故会缩短汽车寿命.

sentences.en: My dress is too long I must shorten it.
sentences.cn: 我的连衣裙太长了,我得把它截短些.

sentences.en: The captain ordered his men to shorten sail.
The days are beginning to shorten, eg in autumn.
sentences.cn: 白天开始变短了(如在秋季).

sentences.en: The days are beginning to shorten.
The letter is too long. Can you shorten it a little?
sentences.cn: 这封信太长了. 你能把它缩短一点 吗 ?

sentences.en: Therefore, people devised an assembly language to shorten and simplify the process.
sentences.cn: 因此, 人们发明了一种汇编语言用来缩短和简化程序.

sentences.en: This in turn will shorten the life of a printing plate.
sentences.cn: 这种现象反过来会缩短印版寿命.

sentences.en: When the days shorten in winter some people suffer depression.
sentences.cn: 冬季天短，有些人会变得抑郁消沉。

words.tran_cn: 短的；不足的；急速的；唐突的
减少,节省,裁减,修剪,缝边

trans.tran_en: to become shorter or make something shorter
